    int a = n + 2*m;

    int b = 2*n + m;

    int res = Math.min(a, b) -2;

Thus, the missing code is the part inside the while loop.

So the code will be:

import java.util.*;
public class Main
{
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);
		int t=sc.nextInt();
		while(t-->0)
		{
		    int n = sc.nextInt();
		    int m = sc.nextInt();
		    if(n == 1 && m ==1){
		        System.out.println(0);
		        continue;
		    }
		    int a = n + 2*m;
		    int b = 2*n + m;
		    int ans = Math.min(a, b) - 2;
		    System.out.println(ans);
		}
	}
}
